sourcesContent:

    const [surname, getSurname] = useState('')

    const [showForm, setShow] = useState(false)
    const [userData, setUserData] = useState('')
    const [jsonUserdata, setjsonUserdata] = useState('')
    const [foundRecord, setfoundRecord] = useState(false)
    const [item_id, setItemId] = useState(0)
    const loadList =()=>{

    }

    const searchlist = ()=> {

    }

    const verify = (item) =>{
      if (item.length > 3) {
      setjsonUserdata = item
      setfoundRecord = true
      Alert.alert(item.surname)

      }else{
        Alert.alert(item.length)
        Alert.alert("Record do not exist, please register.")
      }
      }

    const signUp = (text) =>{
      Alert.alert("Your registration was successful, thanks")
    }

    const getItemById =(text) => {
      Alert.alert('H')
    }

    return (
              <SafeAreaView style={styles.container}>

                <ScrollView style={{flex: 1}}>

                 renderItem={({item})=> (

{/* Here */}
